snippet: Britain’s squabbling newspapers have found common ground: praise for Prime Minister David Cameron’s opposition to a  proposal for a new system of parliamentary-backed regulation.
abstract: Britain’s squabbling newspapers have found common ground, praise for Prime Min David Cameron’s opposition to proposal for new system of parliamentary-backed regulation of press.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s squabbling newspapers have found common ground: praise for Prime Minister David Cameron’s opposition to a  proposal for a new system of parliamentary-backed regulation.

headline.seo: British Press Lauds Cameron Over Leveson Stand
headline.main: Seeing Threat, British Press Hails Cameron as Defender
headline.print_headline: British Press, Seeing Threat, Hails Cameron As Its Defender
